modName: Skyre(Skyrim Redone) Nord Warrior Heart Fix
summary:
To make Skyrim Redone Nord Warrior Heart work properly.
only when you use Skyre_Races.esp + Skyre_combat.esp together.
descriptionHtml:
*beware THIS MODULE is originally from Skyrim Redone & Unofficial Skyrim Redone Patch
you can get USKRP link down below
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/

*If you don't use both skyre_races.esp and Skyre_combat.esp, you don't need this fix at all.


Since Skyre_Races.esp and Skyre_combat.esp conflict when you play a "Nord" Character
Skyre_combat module's combat modification has a perk that reduce player's dealing damage when his or her Health gets lower,
But Skyre_Races Nord Racial trait "Warrior Heart" conflict with that skyre_combat perk.
So this is a simple fix for that conflict and now you get Warrior heart work properly.

This fix changes master list of skyre_combat.esp,
so Skyre_races.esp go upper load order before skyre_combat.esp.
(if you arrange your mod order manually, you should change mod order as I said before)
author: Nobody

files.name: Nord Warrior Heart Fix for Skyre
